abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Clarkia bottae (Spach) H. & Lewis" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Jardin Botanique de Lyon 1 records from Western Carolina University Herbarium 1 records from Herbarium specimens of Université de Montpellier 2, Institut de Botanique (MPU)) 1 records from University of New Mexico Herbarium 1 records from INSDC Sequences 1 records from Phanerogamic Botanical Collections (S) 1 records from University of Tennessee Vascular Herbarium 1 records from CONN 1 records from UCSC Herbarium - Kenneth S. Norris Center for Natural History, University of California Santa Cruz 1 records from The Fungal Collection at the Senckenberg Museum für Naturkunde Görlitz 2 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 2 records from Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - Herbarium Specimens 2 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 2 records from SJSU - Carl W. Sharsmith Herbarium, San Jose State University 2 records from Université Lyon 1 2 records from University of Colorado Museum of Natural History Herbarium Vascular Plant Collection 3 records from Arizona State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 3 records from UTEP Plants (Arctos) 3 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 4 records from SysTax - Botanical Gardens 4 records from HSC - Humboldt State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 5 records from SDSU - San Diego State University Herbarium 6 records from CHSC - CSU Chico, Chico State Herbarium - Vascular Plants 6 records from CDA - California Department of Food and Agriculture 6 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 6 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 8 records from EURISCO, The European Genetic Resources Search Catalogue 10 records from SFV - California State University, Northridge 14 records from LOB - California State University, Long Beach Herbarium 18 records from DAV - UC Davis Herbarium 22 records from SD - SD Herbarium, San Diego Natural History Museum 27 records from The vascular plants collection (P) at the Herbarium of the Muséum national d'Histoire Naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 31 records from OBI - Robert F. Hoover Herbarium, Cal Poly State University 36 records from UCSB - University of California Santa Barbara Herbarium 37 records from UCR - University of California, Riverside Herbarium - Vascular Plants 37 records from LA - University of California, Los Angeles Herbarium 38 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records (USNM, US) 39 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 55 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY) 100 records from CAS Botany (BOT) 117 records from SBBG - Clifton Smith Herbarium, Santa Barbara Botanic Garden 203 records from RSA - California Botanic Garden Herbarium
